Detailed Description

The SSID advertisement module.

Define Documentation

#define SSID_MAX_LEN   32

The maximum size in bytes of an SSID.

Function Documentation

ssize_t get_ssid ( void *  buffer,
size_t  len 
)

Gets the SSID.

Parameters:
[out] buffer the buffer to hold the returned SSID.
[in] len the length of the buffer.
Returns:
the length of the SSID contained in the buffer or -1 if there is an error.

int set_ssid ( const void *  new_ssid,
size_t  len 
)

Sets the SSID.

Parameters:
[in] new_ssid the new SSID to set.
[in] len the length of the new SSID.
Returns:
0 if it is successful, ERR_SSID_TOO_LONG if the new SSID is too long, or non-zero for other errors.
